values: 眼睛；视力；目光；观察力；观点；看法；眼状物；针孔；针眼；孔；环；眼圈；眼眶；眼光；眼力；风眼；芽眼
审视；仔细看；观察；瞄准；保持警惕；（对感兴趣的人或物）表现出兴趣

synonym.mean: 眼睛；视力；眼光；见解，观点

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 看；注视；考虑（eye的过去分词）

word_group.brief_definition: 引起某人的注意；引人瞩目
以…为目标；目标是；谨慎考虑；为…预作计划
明知后果如何, 明知有问题；心中有数
眼睛盯着大事；密切关注关键问题
word_group.phrase: keep your eye on the ball

word_group.brief_definition: 急切地看；全神贯注地看
脑后长眼；眼光敏锐；什么都能觉察到
word_group.phrase: have eyes in the back of your head
take your eye off the ball

word_group.brief_definition: 能进行准确判断(球的速度和方向)
(表示贪吃)眼大肚皮小, 眼馋肚饱
word_group.phrase: one's eyes are bigger than their stomach

bilingual.source: One eye is smaller than the other.
Americans look each other in the eye when they talk.
bilingual.target: 美国人交谈时会看着对方的眼睛。

bilingual.source: Slowly, and with the camera still held to my eye, I turned.
bilingual.target: 我慢慢地转过身，眼睛仍然盯着相机。

bilingual.source: His mouth hung open, his large eye clouded over with faint images of stars in distant galaxies.
bilingual.target: 他的嘴巴张开，他的大眼睛被遥远星系中的微弱星星图像遮住了。
做眼保健操有助于缓解眼睛疲劳。

bilingual.source: This bottle of eye drops can relieve eye strain.
bilingual.target: 这瓶眼药水可以缓解眼睛疲劳。

bilingual.source: The iris is a part of the eye.

list.abstract: eye（英[aɪ]，美[aɪ]），英语单词。作名词时，释义为眼睛；眼状物；目光。作动词时，释义为仔细看；观察；审视。短语搭配为keep an eye on（留神）。例句为“Eye contact can also be aggressive.（眼神交流也可以是挑衅的。）” eye的复数为eyes，现在分词为eyeing、eying，过去分词为eyed。其名词性近义词有viewpoint、vision、sight，动词性形容词有watch、look、behold。
eye是一个英语单词，可以用作名词和及物动词，可以翻译为眼睛、视力，等等。

yingyinNormal.en: And I'm worried one's gonna hit me in the eye.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还担心它会弹到我的眼睛上呢。

yingyinNormal.en: The last time I trusted someone, I lost an eye.
yingyinNormal.zh: 上一次我相信了别人，一只眼睛没了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not just the drum noise. Every five minutes, Joey throws his sticks in the air, and I have to hear, "Oh my eye. Oh god, my eye."
yingyinNormal.zh: 不只是鼓的声音，每5分钟，乔伊把鼓棒丢到空中，然后我就会听到“我的眼睛，上帝啊，我的眼睛!”

yingyinNormal.en: Bernie. How do you know if someone has pink eye? Their eye would be red, swollen and probably oozy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妮妮。红眼病的症状是什么来着？眼睛发红，变肿，还有分泌物。

yingyinNormal.en: Because no one did look it in the eye. Not directly, at least.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为没有人看到它的眼睛，至少没有直接看到。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: And then I add a little bit to each eye and then I try to blend this out to the best of my abilities. And now my eyes are all primed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后每个眼睛加一点，尽可能抹匀。现在眼睛都已经打底完成啦。

yingyinNormal.en: You've got to keep eye contact, and Snape wasn't blinking. Exactly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 念咒时紧盯目标，斯内普眼睛连眨都没眨。千真万确。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, I'm gonna get some more coffee before the pinching and eye-poking begins.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我先倒杯咖啡，然后再回来看你们互戳眼睛。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, I gotta tell you, those eye drops are a miracle. My eye is a 100% better. They're still in my coat. Damn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那眼药水实在是太神奇了，我的眼睛百分之百好了。眼药水还放在我的外套里。可恶。

yingyinNormal.en: But if it kills by looking people in the eye, why is it no one's dead?
yingyinNormal.zh: 可是如果看了它的眼睛就会死，那为什么没有人死呢？
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: No, maybe you should look at me in the eye and tell me what you're hiding.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，或者你应该看着我的眼睛说话，告诉我你所隐瞒的事情。

yingyinNormal.en: That you all have the courage to look them in the eye, and hear their point of view.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们要有勇气注视着他们的眼睛，倾听他们的见解。

yingyinNormal.en: Interesting. Close one eye and say what you see. I can see George. Now close both eyes. Now, I can't see anything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我来看看！闭上一只眼睛，告诉我看到了什么。我能看到乔治。现在两只眼睛都闭上吧。现在我什么都看不到啦。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, if I put an arrow through Loki's eye socket, I'd sleep better, I suppose.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，如果我能往洛基的眼睛里射一箭，我会睡得香一点。

yingyinNormal.en: I grabbed him out of the air, looked him in the eye, and said, Achemon? Ache mine!
yingyinNormal.zh: 后来我终于抓到它了，我看着它的眼睛说，葡萄蔓，我的葡萄蔓！

yingyinNormal.en: But risk disguised as promise. And you've shown promise. I've seen it in your eye, and I know that look because I've had it myself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 期望可以让人不计冒险的代价，并且你已经让我看到期望了，我是在你的眼睛里看到的我能看到它是因为它在我的眼睛里也有。

yingyinNormal.en: Ok, places, everyone. Come on, come on. Get in position. Wait, I can't find my other eye.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，各就各位，快点，赶快就位。稍等，我的另一只眼睛找不到了。

yingyinNormal.en: Shit. I'm using my wrong eye again, aren't I? I'm sorry, that was meant to be behind your back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 糟糕，我又眨错眼睛了是吗？不好意思，本来打算背着你们眨的。

yingyinNormal.en: You can like, bite, and pull people's hair and stuff? Yeah, anything goes, except eye gouging and fish hooking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可以咬人、扯别人的头发？都可以，除了戳眼睛和鱼钩手。

yingyinNormal.en: And I could see her saying yes. When I look at this ring, all I see is a ring. Unless I look at it really closely and then I can see my own eye.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这枚戒指只让我看到一枚戒指，只有近看才会看到我的眼睛。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 以...为目标；目标是；谨慎考虑；为...预作计划

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: They have big <highlight>eyes</highlight> and distinctive visual centers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们有大眼睛和独特的视觉中枢。

examination_example.sentence: For the first time in my life, I have a clear-<highlight>eyed</highlight> view of myself that is authentic, compassionate and accepting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人生中首次我对自己有了一个清晰的认识：真实、富有同情心和乐于接受。

examination_example.sentence: The problem often arises around the <highlight>eyes</highlight> or mouth, says Webber.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Webber称，这个问题经常出现在眼睛或嘴巴周围。

examination_example.sentence: This will need a more sceptical <highlight>eye</highlight> on the science.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这将需要对科学有更多怀疑的注意力。

examination_example.sentence: Schellenberg took that news in stride while continuing to cast a skeptical <highlight>eye</highlight> on the research in his field.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Schellenberg从容地接受了这一消息，同时继续对他所在领域的研究持怀疑态度。

examination_example.sentence: They're doing so with an <highlight>eye</highlight> towards giving their products an advantage over the competition, and bolstering profits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们这样做的目的是让他们的产品在竞争中具有优势，并提高利润。

sense_info_list.en: used to refer to someone's opinion or attitude toward something
look at or watch closely or with interest

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Such seemingly straightforward distinctions become blurry through numberless <highlight>eyes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些表面上简单的区别在无数的眼睛中变得模糊了。

examination_example.sentence: Some 40% of Americans get less than seven hours of shut-<highlight>eye</highlight> on weeknights.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大约40%的美国人在工作日晚上的睡眠时间不足7小时。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 眼睛；眼状物；目光；眼圈；看法；眼眶；针眼；观点；眼力

examination_example.sentence: With shining dark <highlight>eyes</highlight>, he seems like the of kid who would enjoy public speaking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他有一双闪亮的黑眼睛，看起来像是一个喜欢公开演讲的孩子。

examination_example.sentence: In the wild, many cats hunt at night because their <highlight>eyes</highlight> are designed for low light.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在野外，许多猫都在晚上猎食，因为它们的眼睛生来就能适应昏暗的光线。

examination_example.sentence: When we handed him the bag of food, he lit up and thanked us with watery <highlight>eyes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们把那袋食物递给他时，他面露喜色，泪眼汪汪地感谢我们。

examination_example.sentence: The woman's <highlight>eye</highlight> fell on the man's face, and she immediately looked down and adjusted her scarf.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 女人的目光落在男人的脸上，她立刻低下头，整理了一下围巾。

sense_info_list.en: used to refer to someone's opinion or attitude toward something

examination_example.sentence: Campers, in my <highlight>eyes</highlight>, were people who enjoyed insect bites, ill-cooked meals, and uncomfortable sleeping bags.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我看来，露营者是会“享受”昆虫叮咬、饭菜难吃、睡袋不适的人。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 引起某人的注意；引人瞩目

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Remember to use sunglasses to stop the sun from shining directly in your <highlight>eyes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 记得使用太阳镜来阻止阳光直接照射到眼睛里。

examination_example.sentence: Finally, when my story ended, there were tears in her <highlight>eyes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，当我的故事结束时，她的眼睛里有泪水。

examination_example.sentence: They buy bottles of eye drops to keep their <highlight>eyes</highlight> wet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们买几瓶眼药水来保持眼睛湿润。
